rukus.text: 55|1|a l laoh mha sabborsa .
55|2|trong ban bangrien kompir kuor an( dl mnoussa lok) .
55|3|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok .
55|4|trong ban bangrien ke aoy cheh briyay sapvobebyeang .
55|5|preahatity  ning preah chnt thveudamnaer tam karkamnt da cheak  leak .
55|6|haey roukkhcheate ning daemchheu neanea saou chout( champoh a l laoh) .
55|7|haey mekh  trong ban leuk vea aoy khpasa  haey trong ban bangkeut  aoy mean pheap you tde thmr( now leu phendei)
55|8|daembi komaoy puok anak bampean leu pheap you tde thmr noh .
55|9|haey chaur puok anak brate b tde knong kar thloeng aoy ban troemotrauv haey  kom thveu aoy khveah phnekachonhching aoy saoh .
55|10|haey phendei  trong ban bangkeut vea( reabasmae) samreab satv  lok .
55|11|daoy now leu vea  mean phlechheu  ning daem lmeu del mean changkom  phle cheachraen .
55|12|ning kreabthonhnhocheate del mean saambk  promteang roukkhcheate del  mean klenokraaub .
55|13|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|14|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok( a da) pi deiidth snguot dauchchea  dei delke saun chea saamphear .
55|15|haey trong ban bangkeut chin ampi andataphleung .
55|16|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|17|( a l laoh) chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preahatity reah ( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga)  ning chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preah  atity lich( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga) .
55|18|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|19|trong ban thveu aoy samoutr pir( tuksaeab ning tukabrai) chuobaknea .
55|20|now rveang vea teangpir mean rneang khand min aoy chreabchaul knea .
55|21|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|22|kchkhyang  ning phkathm chenhpi vea teangpir( samoutr tuksaeab ning tukabrai) .
55|23|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|24|haey neavea thom  del thveudamnaer now leu phtaisamoutr hak  dauchchea phnom noh  kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong .
55|25|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
